name: Mr. Jackpots
description:
Game made in 2 days for Wowie Game Jam #3, themed "Failure is Progress".

In Mr. Jackpots you're trying to lose all your money, but it just so happens that you are a very lucky bastard.

Use the odds of winning and your own luck to lose as much money as possible. In the end we all lose.

Alex Silveira - Coding
Vermei - Coding / Visual Art
Cássio Machado - Music / Sound Effects
